00013   _full_text = """# This message contains the state of one realtime controller
00014 # that was spawned in the controller manager
00015 
00016 # the name of the controller
00017 string name
00018 
00019 # the type of the controller
00020 string type
00021 
00022 # the time at which these controller statistics were measured
00023 time timestamp
00024 
00025 # bool that indicates if the controller is currently
00026 # in a running or a stopped state
00027 bool running
00028 
00029 # the maximum time the update loop of the controller ever needed to complete
00030 duration max_time
00031 
00032 # the average time the update loop of the controller needs to complete.
00033 # the average is computed in a sliding time window.
00034 duration mean_time
00035 
00036 # the variance on the time the update loop of the controller needs to complete.
00037 # the variance applies to a sliding time window.
00038 duration variance_time
00039 
00040 # the number of times this controller broke the realtime loop
00041 int32 num_control_loop_overruns
00042 
00043 # the timestamp of the last time this controller broke the realtime loop
00044 time time_last_control_loop_overrun
00045 """
00046   __slots__ = ['name','type','timestamp','running','max_time','mean_time','variance_time','num_control_loop_overruns','time_last_control_loop_overrun']
